mapper.select: SELECT UC.UNIT_CROSS_ID AS UNIT_CROSS_ID, UCT.UNIT_CROSS_TRAIN_ID AS UNIT_CROSS_TRAIN_ID, UCT.UNIT_CROSS_ID AS UNIT_CROSS_ID, UCT.GROUP_SERIAL_NBR AS GROUP_SERIAL_NBR, UCT.MARSHALLING_NAME AS MARSHALLING_NAME, UCT.TRAIN_SORT AS TRAIN_SORT, UCT.TRAIN_NBR AS TRAIN_NBR, UCT.BASE_TRAIN_ID AS BASE_TRAIN_ID, UCT.START_STN AS START_STN, UCT.START_BUREAU AS START_BUREAU, UCT.END_STN AS END_STN, UCT.END_BUREAU AS END_BUREAU, UCT.DAY_GAP AS DAY_GAP, UCT.ALTERNATE_TRAIN_NBR AS ALTERNATE_TRAIN_NBR, UCT.ALTERNATE_TIME AS ALTERNATE_TIME, UCT.SPARE_FLAG AS SPARE_FLAG, UCT.SPARE_APPLY_FLAG AS SPARE_APPLY_FLAG, UCT.HIGHLINE_FLAG AS HIGHLINE_FLAG, UCT.HIGHLINE_RULE AS HIGHLINE_RULE, UCT.COMMONLINE_RULE AS COMMONLINE_RULE, UCT.APPOINT_WEEK AS APPOINT_WEEK, UCT.APPOINT_DAY AS APPOINT_DAY FROM UNIT_CROSS UC INNER JOIN UNIT_CROSS_TRAIN UCT ON UC.UNIT_CROSS_ID = UCT.UNIT_CROSS_ID

SELECT PC.UNIT_CROSS_ID AS UNIT_CROSS_ID, PC.GROUP_TOTAL_NBR AS GROUP_TOTAL_NBR, PC.PLAN_CROSS_ID AS PLAN_CROSS_ID, PC.BASE_CHART_ID AS BASE_CHART_ID, UCT.GROUP_SERIAL_NBR AS GROUP_SERIAL_NBR, UCT.MARSHALLING_NAME AS MARSHALLING_NAME, UCT.TRAIN_SORT AS TRAIN_SORT, UCT.UNIT_CROSS_TRAIN_ID AS UNIT_CROSS_TRAIN_ID, UCT.UNIT_CROSS_ID AS UNIT_CROSS_ID, UCT.GROUP_SERIAL_NBR AS GROUP_SERIAL_NBR, UCT.MARSHALLING_NAME AS MARSHALLING_NAME, UCT.TRAIN_SORT AS TRAIN_SORT, UCT.TRAIN_NBR AS TRAIN_NBR, UCT.BASE_TRAIN_ID AS BASE_TRAIN_ID, UCT.START_STN AS START_STN, UCT.START_BUREAU AS START_BUREAU, UCT.END_STN AS END_STN, UCT.END_BUREAU AS END_BUREAU, UCT.DAY_GAP AS DAY_GAP, UCT.ALTERNATE_TRAIN_NBR AS ALTERNATE_TRAIN_NBR, UCT.ALTERNATE_TIME AS ALTERNATE_TIME, UCT.SPARE_FLAG AS SPARE_FLAG, UCT.SPARE_APPLY_FLAG AS SPARE_APPLY_FLAG, UCT.HIGHLINE_FLAG AS HIGHLINE_FLAG, UCT.HIGHLINE_RULE AS HIGHLINE_RULE, UCT.COMMONLINE_RULE AS COMMONLINE_RULE, UCT.APPOINT_WEEK AS APPOINT_WEEK, UCT.APPOINT_DAY AS APPOINT_DAY FROM PLAN_CROSS PC INNER JOIN UNIT_CROSS_TRAIN UCT ON PC.UNIT_CROSS_ID = UCT.UNIT_CROSS_ID ORDER BY PC.PLAN_CROSS_ID, UCT.GROUP_SERIAL_NBR, UCT.TRAIN_SORT
